leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-变异检测与基因分型生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: CLI + 评测套件 + 数据集

tools.name: laytr
tools.one_line_profile: Library for variant benchmarking stratification
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to assist in the stratification of variant benchmarking, likely used in conjunction with tools like Truvari to evaluate variant calling performance across different genomic regions.

tools.name: truvari
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant comparison and benchmarking toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for benchmarking, merging, and annotating structural variants (SVs) in VCF format. It is widely used for evaluating SV caller performance against truth sets.

tools.name: HapPy
tools.one_line_profile: Haploidy and Size Completeness Estimation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating haploidy and size completeness in genomic assemblies, useful for assessing genome assembly quality.

tools.name: BlueQuartz-BCFTools
tools.one_line_profile: Unpacker for Bruker Esprit data files
tools.detailed_description: Utilities to unpack and process Bruker Esprit (.bcf) data files, which are generated by electron microscopy/spectroscopy instruments. Note: Distinct from the bioinformatics 'bcftools'.

tools.name: genotype
tools.one_line_profile: Simple genotype comparison of VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for comparing genotypes between VCF files, useful for validating sample identity or concordance checking in clinical genomics pipelines.

tools.name: oncoliner
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for somatic variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking platform designed to monitor, improve, and harmonize somatic variant calling workflows across genomic oncology centers.

tools.name: U-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for U-Net variants
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking suite for evaluating various U-Net architectures, commonly used in biomedical image segmentation tasks.

tools.name: SVsim
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic Structural Variant generator
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates synthetic Structural Variant (SV) calls to serve as benchmarks for testing and evaluating SV calling pipelines.

tools.name: collapse-bubble
tools.one_line_profile: Pangenome structural variation merging tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for merging structural variations (SV) and overlapping variants in the context of pangenome analysis.

tools.name: hap.py
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype VCF comparison and benchmarking tool
tools.detailed_description: The industry-standard tool for comparing VCF files against a truth set, accounting for haplotype equivalence. Developed by Illumina, it is essential for variant calling benchmarking.

tools.name: happyR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for hap.py output analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to parse, analyze, and visualize the output generated by the hap.py variant benchmarking tool.

tools.name: witty.er
tools.one_line_profile: Large variant benchmarking tool
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool for large variants, designed to be analogous to hap.py (which focuses on small variants). It evaluates the accuracy of variant callers for larger genomic events.

tools.name: vcf-observer
tools.one_line_profile: VCF analysis and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing, comparing, and visualizing VCF files to inspect variant calling results.

tools.name: HiFi-somatic-WDL
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio HiFi tumor-normal variant calling workflow
tools.detailed_description: A WDL-based workflow for performing somatic variant calling using PacBio HiFi long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: pbsv
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio structural variant caller
tools.detailed_description: A structural variant caller and analysis suite specifically designed for PacBio long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: sv-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio CCS HG002 Structural Variant Benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A public benchmark dataset and associated tools for evaluating long-read structural variant callers using PacBio CCS data on the HG002 sample.

tools.name: sv_benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive structural variant caller benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite for evaluating the performance of various structural variant calling tools.

tools.name: bioluigi
tools.one_line_profile: Luigi tasks for bioinformatics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A library of reusable Luigi tasks for building bioinformatics pipelines, facilitating workflow management and reproducibility.

tools.name: VCFSimulator-SamukLab
tools.one_line_profile: Coalescent-based VCF simulation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that interfaces with msprime to generate simulated VCF files based on coalescent simulations, useful for benchmarking population genetics software.

tools.name: proteingym-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for protein variant effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A collection of models and pipelines for benchmarking variant effect prediction algorithms against the ProteinGym datasets.

tools.name: rtg-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for accurate VCF comparison and manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for processing and analyzing VCF files, including 'vcfeval', a highly accurate variant comparison tool used for benchmarking.

tools.name: benchmarker
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking for GWAS prioritization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A tool for benchmarking gene and variant prioritization algorithms specifically for Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS) data.

tools.name: Sudoku-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: AI benchmark for reasoning and problem solving
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the creative and human-like problem-solving capabilities of AI models using Sudoku variants.

tools.name: hap-eval
tools.one_line_profile: VCF comparison engine for SV benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A VCF comparison engine developed by Sentieon, specifically optimized for benchmarking structural variants.

tools.name: Covigator NGS Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 NGS variant calling and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for NGS variant calling on SARS-CoV-2 data. It processes FASTQ files to produce normalized and annotated VCF files using tools like GATK, BCFtools, LoFreq, and iVar.

tools.name: Tronflow VCF Postprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for VCF variant normalization
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline focused on the post-processing and normalization of VCF files, utilizing vt and bcftools to standardize variant representations.

tools.name: vcfdist
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking tool for phased variant calls
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurately benchmarking phased variant calls, providing metrics to evaluate the quality and consistency of phasing in VCF files.

tools.name: WRAVAL
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for LLM writing assistant tasks
tools.detailed_description: A tool to help evaluate Large Language Models (LLMs) for writing assistant tasks, including summarization and tone adjustment, developed by Amazon Science.

tools.name: SMaSH
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking toolkit for variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking toolkit designed to evaluate the performance of variant calling algorithms, facilitating the comparison of different callers.

tools.name: ABySS-2.0-GIAB
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for assembling Genome in a Bottle data using ABySS
tools.detailed_description: A workflow (Makefile) provided by BCGSC to assemble the Genome in a Bottle (GIAB) sequencing data using the ABySS assembler, serving as a reference or reproduction utility.

tools.name: WES Benchmarking Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking pipeline for WES aligners and variant callers
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for benchmarking various aligners and variant callers specifically for Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) data.

tools.name: BioC++ IO
tools.one_line_profile: Input/Output library for bioinformatics file formats
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library providing input and output functionality for various bioinformatics file formats, part of the BioC++ project.

tools.name: VarSim
tools.one_line_profile: High-fidelity genome sequencing simulation and validation framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for simulating high-throughput genome sequencing data with a focus on cancer applications, used for validating and benchmarking variant calling pipelines.

tools.name: SComatic
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic variant caller for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for detecting somatic variants in single-cell sequencing data, addressing the specific challenges of single-cell variant calling.

tools.name: starfish
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype-aware VCF intersection tool
tools.detailed_description: A utility to intersect multiple VCF files while maintaining haplotype awareness, useful for comparing variant calls.

tools.name: Sansa
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant VCF annotation and comparison tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for annotating, removing duplicates, and comparing Structural Variant (SV) VCF files.

tools.name: SURVIVOR
tools.one_line_profile: Toolset for Structural Variant simulation, comparison, and filtering
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolset for simulating, comparing, filtering, and converting Structural Variant (SV) calls in VCF format.

tools.name: GA4GH Benchmarking Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized benchmarking methods for germline small variant calls
tools.detailed_description: Repository containing tools and standards developed by the GA4GH Benchmarking Team for evaluating germline small variant calls, including the hap.py benchmarking tool.

tools.name: GATK4 Somatic SNVs Indels Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: GATK Best Practices workflow for somatic SNV and Indel calling
tools.detailed_description: The official GATK workflow for detecting somatic SNVs and Indels, representing the Best Practices for somatic variant calling.

tools.name: GIAB Genome Stratifications
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic stratification BED files for benchmarking variant calls
tools.detailed_description: A collection of BED files defining genomic stratifications (e.g., difficult regions) used to stratify true positives, false positives, and false negatives during variant call benchmarking.

tools.name: GIAB Data Indexes
tools.one_line_profile: Data indexes for Genome in a Bottle datasets
tools.detailed_description: Repository containing data indexes and metadata for accessing NIST's Genome in a Bottle reference datasets.

tools.name: DeepSomatic
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based somatic variant caller
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline that uses a deep neural network to call somatic variants from tumor-normal and tumor-only sequencing data, developed by Google.

tools.name: SV_Benchmark_CMRG_GIAB
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant benchmark dataset and configuration for CMRG/GIAB
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark set for structural variant calling, utilizing the CMRG and GIAB reference standards to evaluate SV callers.

tools.name: svbench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking tool for structural variant calls against reference sets
tools.detailed_description: A tool to benchmark structural variant calls against a reference set, providing metrics for precision, recall, and other performance indicators.

tools.name: torchsdf-fusion
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking PyTorch variants of TSDF fusion for 3D reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking repository for evaluating different PyTorch implementations of Truncated Signed Distance Function (TSDF) fusion, used in 3D reconstruction tasks.

tools.name: NanoVarBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Nanopore-based bacterial variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline and toolset for evaluating the performance of variant calling methods on Nanopore sequencing data, specifically for bacterial genomes.

tools.name: variantbenchmarking
tools.one_line_profile: nf-core pipeline for evaluating variant calling accuracy
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline developed by nf-core to evaluate and validate the accuracy of variant calling methods in genomic research, providing standardized metrics and reports.

tools.name: pysam
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for SAM/BAM/CRAM/VCF/BCF manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for reading, manipulating, and writing genomics data sets, acting as a lightweight wrapper around the HTSlib C-API.

tools.name: HaplotypeTools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for identifying recombination and recombinant genotypes
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for analyzing haplotype data to identify recombination events and recombinant genotypes in sequence data.

tools.name: cievad
tools.one_line_profile: Tool suite for rapid evaluation of variant callsets
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined tool suite and pipeline for evaluating variant callsets, developed by RKI, facilitating rapid quality assessment of genomic variants.

tools.name: FlowSOM_Python
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of FlowSOM for cytometry data analysis
tools.detailed_description: The Python implementation of the FlowSOM algorithm, used for clustering and visualization of flow cytometry and high-dimensional data.

tools.name: bcftools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for variant calling and manipulating VCF/BCF files
tools.detailed_description: A set of utilities that manipulate variant calls in the Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart (BCF). It is a core tool for variant calling, filtering, and analysis.

tools.name: rd-imputation-accuracy
tools.one_line_profile: Metrics calculation library for phasing and genotype imputation accuracy evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to evaluate the accuracy of phasing and genotype imputation tools (such as BEAGLE, EAGLE, SHAPEIT, MINIMAC, IMPUTE). It implements metrics including Imputation Quality Score (IQS), Pearson correlation (r2), and Concordance to benchmark performance.

tools.name: vcztools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for VCF to Zarr conversion and manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A partial reimplementation of bcftools designed for the VCF Zarr specification. It provides high-performance tools for converting and processing variant call data in the Zarr format, facilitating integration with the sgkit ecosystem.

tools.name: dna-seq-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for benchmarking variant calling approaches
tools.detailed_description: A standardized Snakemake workflow designed to benchmark DNA sequencing variant calling pipelines against standard truth sets like Genome in a Bottle (GIAB) and CHM (syndip). It automates the comparison and reporting process.

tools.name: defrabb
tools.one_line_profile: Development framework for assembly-based benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: Developed by NIST, this framework supports the creation and analysis of assembly-based benchmarks for the Genome in a Bottle (GIAB) project, facilitating the evaluation of genome assembly quality.

tools.name: giab-stratifications
tools.one_line_profile: Stratification definitions and tools for GIAB reference datasets
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and bed files from NIST to define genomic stratifications (e.g., difficult regions, repeats) for Genome in a Bottle reference materials, essential for granular benchmarking of variant callers.

tools.name: svlib
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for structural variant extraction and benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A C++ toolkit designed for extracting structural variants (SVs) from long sequences and benchmarking SV variant callers. It provides efficient utilities for handling SV representations and comparisons.

tools.name: hprc_release2_graph_variant_benchmarking
tools.one_line_profile: Graph variant benchmarking workflow for HPRC Release 2
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow developed for the Human Pangenome Reference Consortium (HPRC) to benchmark graph-based variant calling methods against the Release 2 pangenome references.

tools.name: TriALS
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for medical image segmentation challenges
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework for medical image segmentation (MICCAI 2024/2025), incorporating baselines like nnUNet, SAMed, Mamba Variants, and MedNeXT to establish performance standards.

tools.name: Varathon
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable variant calling and benchmarking framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework supporting both short and long read data for variant calling and benchmarking. It aims to provide a scalable solution for evaluating variant caller performance across different sequencing technologies.
